title: Microsoft dinosaurs (PC)
brief_description: Grab your jungle gear, put on your pith helmet and brace yourself - you’re going on a journey of a lifetime! Travel deep into the forest primeval and come face to face with those incredible animals that roamed and ruled the Earth millions of years ago. Hear them growl, explore their habitats and see who they meet in mortal combat.
